content.rendered:
CHERYL SHAW

Mortgage Associate

  • 780.966.9691
  • cheryl.shaw@vinegroup.ca
  • English
  • Calgary

With over 16 years immersed in the mortgage industry, Cheryl’s commitment remains unwavering to offer clients a wide spectrum of choices, top-notch service, and excellent rates. Serving as a comprehensive mortgage broker, her dedication extends from the initial application submission to addressing inquiries long after securing the mortgage. Holding designations such as Accredited Mortgage Professional (AMP) and Certified Smith Manoeuvre Mortgage Professional, Cheryl adheres to the highest standards, engaging in discussions about advanced mortgage strategies focused on wealth creation through real estate.

Cheryl’s primary focus revolves around assisting clients in achieving their financial goals. Whether it entails introducing unique products or navigating through credit challenges, clients can rely on a commitment to candid and exceptional service. Additionally, she has a strong network of professionals, including realtors, lawyers, home inspectors, home and auto insurance agents, and financial planners, ensuring a seamless and efficient process.

Beyond professional endeavours, a passion for financial literacy drives involvement as a Financial Presenter with the Empower U program through the United Way. During her leisure time, Cheryl’s interests include camping, exploring the backcountry on a side-by-side vehicle, playing pickleball, and cherishing quality moments at a second home in Mexico.
